abstract: Levante, infrequent visitor to Spain’s top division in soccer, holds a slim lead over Real Madrid and Barcelona atop the standings.
snippet: Levante, an infrequent visitor to Spain’s top division, holds something rarer still: a slim lead over Real Madrid and Barcelona atop the standings.
lead_paragraph: Levante, an infrequent visitor to Spain’s top division, holds something rarer still: a slim lead over Real Madrid and Barcelona atop the standings.

headline.main: Underdog Turns Heads at the Top in Spain
headline.print_headline: Underdog Turns Heads At the Top In Spain
headline.seo: Levante, La Liga’s David, Stares Down at Spain’s Two Goliaths
